channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Keap Official Opt-in Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Keap Official Opt-in Forms

item.title: CVE-2023-6941|2024-08-02T08:42:08.514Z -- unknown -- keap%20official%20opt-in%20forms
item.description: The Keap Official Opt-in Forms WordPress plugin through 1.0.11 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example, in multisite setup).
